Chintan B. Maniyar poses with his poster titled 'Cyanosense 2.0: Low-cost wireless sensor network for continuous and real-time monitoring of Cyanobacterial Harmful Algal blooms in Freshwater Lakes' at the NASA Biodiversity and Ecological Conservation (BDEC) Annual Meeting 2025 in Washington DC.

Chintan B. Maniyar delivers his talk titled 'Low-cost sensor to strengthen CyanoHAB monitoring with new gen ocean color satellites for underrepresented regions' at the ASPRS Mid South Conference in Oak Ridge, Tennessee.

Chintan B. Maniyar poses with his poster titled 'A Modular Machine Learning Framework to remotely estimate Phycocyanin concentration in Cyanobacterial Harmful Algal Blooms' at the AGU Annual Meeting 2024 in Washington DC.

Chintan B. Maniyar gives a walktrough of his poster titled 'Cyanosense 2.0: Low-cost wireless sensor network for continuous and real-time monitoring of Cyanobacterial Harmful Algal blooms in Freshwater Lakes' at the AGU Annual Meeting 2024 in Washington DC.
The CyanoTRACKER Team and the Mishra Lab enjoy a meal at the AGU Annual Meeting 2024 in Washington DC.

Abhishek Kumar delivers his oral talk titled 'High-Frequency Monitoring of Cyanobacterial Harmful Algal Blooms in Large Inland Waters Using Geostationary Satellite Data' at the AGU Annual Meeting 2024 in Washington DC.
Abhishek Kumar poses with his oral panel, 'H51E - Monitoring, Prediction, and Mitigation of Harmful Algal Blooms (HABs) I Oral', at the AGU Annual Meeting 2024 in Washington DC.
